configFile.content:
apiVersion: kubelet.config.k8s.io/v1beta1
streamingConnectionIdleTimeout: 0
eventRecordQPS: 0
protectKernelDefaults: false
authentication:
  webhook:
    cacheTTL: 0s
    enabled: true
  x509:
    clientCAFile: /var/lib/minikube/certs/ca.crt
authorization:
  mode: AlwaysAllow
  webhook:
    cacheAuthorizedTTL: 0s
    cacheUnauthorizedTTL: 0s
